text: Pac-Man is a character from the video game Pac-Man. He eats Pac-Dots in a maze and avoids the Ghost Gang. There are also power pellets that let Pac-Man eat his enemies. There are many different Pac-Mans. In the television series, Pac- Man has arms and legs, but in the game, he does not have any of them. Category:Pac-Man Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1980 Category:Video game characters
title: Pac-Man (character)
